subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: With a gritty and inartistic performance typical of the season under its new coach, Mike Rice, the 12th-seeded Scarlet Knights won in the first round of the Big East tournament.
snippet: With a gritty and inartistic performance typical of the season under its new coach, Mike Rice, the 12th-seeded Scarlet Knights won in the first round of the Big East tournament.
